Abstract:
This package for &GAP; 4 (at least version 4.4) provides routines for computations with Residue Class-Wise Affine mappings of \Z, its semilocalizations \Z_{(\pi)} and the polynomial rings GF( q )[ x ], hence it can be used for computations in certain types of infinite permutation groups.
It is completely written in the &GAP; language and contains / requires no external binaries.
The package &ResClasses; is needed for dealing with all of the basic residue classes stuff, and the package GRAPE is needed for dealing with graphs of rcwa mappings.
For the documentation, the package &GAPDoc; is needed.
&RCWA; must be installed in the pkg subdirectory of the &GAP; distribution.
